messages.message: For crafting aihub, is there a pre-determined login for site admins?
Nothing as far as I'm aware (cc @Serena / @Paul H in case they've added something in the past) -- I can give you site admin permissions though, give me like 5 minutes!
paul created a shared site admin account a while ago! search for "Crafting Site Admin" in 1password
Oop fantastic, thanks! @Sayan let us know if you have any trouble logging in with these credentials :slightly_smiling_face:
Hm, Paul's logins work for the ib-dev crafting sandboxes that use the same shared db, but they don't work for the ib-dev backend sandboxes I'm pretty sure since they all have an empty db
Yeah, the login didn't work successfully in my ib-dev backend sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/sayanbhattacharjee1). Could you make one / detail how to make one @sean.donohoe

Ah that's a great point @Udit, I had just assumed we were discussing https://crafting-aihub.test.instabase.com/ :sweat_smile: @Sayan are you able to access the `/apps/admin` URI for your sandbox? I haven't looked at the default credentials setup for local sandboxes in some time so we may need to ask for help from others if you don't have access by default
(cc @mfichman in case he knows, I am very much not equipped to say much about the local db setup :sweat_smile: )
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yQOCxOISV_ukUxXdPJDoN-rERtOhdVRe7zv1swF1igw/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.ozg2l97f461a has instructions for loggin in as an admin!

This might be a crafting specific thing so I'm asking here. When the site admin account is created in our crafting sandboxes, it creates a community account. Does this go through the normal flow of account creation? I tried creating a project and I got the following error:
```2025/02/08 01:04:44 WARNING coreplatformservice/aihub/handler.go:99 -- Repo (admin/my-repo) not found
2025/02/08 01:04:44 ERROR coreplatformservice/aihub/handler.go:100 -- [ACCESS_DENIED]: Access denied (Err: Repo (admin/my-repo) not found. Err: sql: no rows in result set)```
However, I tried creating an account on aihub.instabase.com (http://aihub.instabase.com) and it seemed to be able to create the project after.
The site admin is not created using the normal account creation logic, so please use other accounts to create Build projects / apps and run apps
